/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with a variety of buildings, their facades adorned with colorful signs and advertisements, adding a vibrant touch to the urban landscape. Cars and buses traverse the street, indicating a busy time of day. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the bustling activity below.
